directions: Process 1/2 cup of tomatoes, along with the water and oil, in a blender or food processor until pureed. Transfer to a medium bowl, along with remaining ingredients. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Refrigerate until ready to serve. (Can be made several hours before serving.)
ingredients: 2 (14.5 ounce) cans diced tomatoes (I use Hunt's Petite Diced)
1 small yellow bell pepper, seeded and cut into 1/4-inch dice
1 small jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced (optional)
2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley, basil or cilantro
Salt and freshly ground black pepper
title: Quick Classic Gazpacho
